channel.title: StickWars
channel.description:
I decided to pick up Flash Pro 8 again, been a few months. I was doing some tests and all I can say is it's not like riding a bike, because I forgot how to do everything :eek: :(
Anyway I'm gonna keep workin on it anyway, it just has a play button but tell me if nothing comes up, because I have the preloader not showing, it's just black for a minute. [url=http://img230.imageshack.us/my.php?image=preloaderwi5.swf]SWF[/url]
Pic [img]http://img79.imageshack.us/img79/7108/stickwars01qp4.jpg[/img]
Steps: 1. Black backround 2. New layer 3. Cool, sharp, grungy type brushing in white 4. merge 5. Hue/""/"" change 6. New Layer 7. Same brushes in white around the edges- opacity drop 8. Merge 9. Downloaded StarWars font off [url=http://www.dafont.com]DaFont[/url] 10. Put in Stick Wars 11. Rastersized 12. Moved the text around a bit 13. Added effects for engrave, and lighting metal look 14. Merged with BG 15. Added flare effects 16. Created StickMan 1 17. Created light saber 1 18. StickMan 2 19. light saber 2 20. Merged all 21. Added flare effect on the saber clash 22. Flash etc etc..[br][size=1]Posted on: March 18, 2007, 12:10:03 PM[/size][hr]Rate and Comment <_< ??

item.title: StickWars
item.dc:creator: @LegendaryLoser .Flair
item.description:
@LegendaryLoser wrote:

Immortal:

Look forward to seeing the actual flash movie I always make lightsaber duels in Flash

In progress, but sadly, can’t expect it for another month. A week or two of that is just going to be picking up the skills again.

item.title: StickWars

item.description:
@LegendaryLoser wrote:

I decided to pick up Flash Pro 8 again, been a few months. I was doing some tests and all I can say is it’s not like riding a bike, because I forgot how to do everything :eek:

Anyway I’m gonna keep workin on it anyway, it just has a play button but tell me if nothing comes up, because I have the preloader not showing, it’s just black for a minute. SWF

Pic

Steps:

  1. Black backround
  2. New layer
  3. Cool, sharp, grungy type brushing in white
  4. merge
  5. Hue/""/"" change
  6. New Layer
  7. Same brushes in white around the edges- opacity drop
  8. Merge
  9. Downloaded StarWars font off DaFont
  10. Put in Stick Wars
  11. Rastersized
  12. Moved the text around a bit
  13. Added effects for engrave, and lighting metal look
  14. Merged with BG
  15. Added flare effects
  16. Created StickMan 1
  17. Created light saber 1
  18. StickMan 2
  19. light saber 2
  20. Merged all
  21. Added flare effect on the saber clash
  22. Flash etc etc…[br][size=1]Posted on: March 18, 2007, 12:10:03 PM[/size][hr]Rate and Comment <_< ??
